forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Plenty of sunshine. High 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 12C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 53F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near 45F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 13C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High 56F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 53F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. High 54F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear in the evening. Increasing clouds with showers after midnight. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 47F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
